data.title: Welcome to Energia Limited – Energia Limited
data.text:
welcome

ENERGIA LIMITED

Energia Limited is the Joint Venture Operator of the Ebendo/Obodeti Marginal Field (ex-Obodougwa/Obodeti Marginal field) located in Ebendo near Kwale, Ndokwa West LGA, Delta State, in partnership with Oando Production and Development Company (OPDC) in a 55%/45% working interest in favour of Energia Limited and its JV partner (Oando).

. Roadmap

Milestone Achievements

Energia Limited currently has a Production potential of 10,000 bopd, and is currently working on installing a Modular Refinery in its area of operations.

. Management Staff

OUR TEAM

Day by day activities is determined by the Management Staff drawn from different facets of the society. The management staff is result-oriented in their various place of assignment.

As part of its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR), Energia Limited (Energia) in conjunction with other cluster members collaborated to provide support to the Delta State Government in its fight against the Coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
